case_title: MUHAMMAD AYUB vs DIRECTOR AGRICULTURE, AZAD JAMMU AND KASHMIR and another
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
respondents: Director Agriculture, Azad Jammu and Kashmir

key_points: Appellant was dismissed from service without departmental proceedings or show-cause notice.
Appellant was convicted by Anti-Corruption Judge but later acquitted by the High Court.
Dismissal order violated mandatory provisions of E&D Rules, specifically Rule 9.
High Court judgment exonerated appellant from charges of misappropriation.
Appeal deemed competent despite arguments of time-bar and procedural deficiencies.
judgment_summary.final_decision: Appellant reinstated with all back benefits and deemed to have been in service throughout.
